case_header.outcome: Successful Discharge to Home with HHA

clinical_logic.readiness_milestone: Wound contraction and reduction in size following debridement
clinical_barriers: Need for specialized at-home wound treatment

environmental_logic.physical_barriers: Not explicitly noted as a delay factor

timeline_deltas.context: Admitted 8/11; discharge meeting did not occur until 10/30 despite wound improvement being the only stated barrier.

reasoning_trace_triples.situation: Patient expressed high anxiety to return home during 11/7 visit.
reasoning_trace_triples.action_taken: Real-time coordination with Regional Director/HHA while bedside with patient.
reasoning_trace_triples.result: Secured a Tuesday visit that accommodated the patient's dialysis-free day, increasing patient satisfaction.

reasoning_trace_triples.situation: Initial SNF point of contact was unavailable at the facility.
reasoning_trace_triples.action_taken: Proactive networking with alternate floor Social Workers to secure the correct contact (Sierra).
reasoning_trace_triples.result: Established a high-responsiveness communication channel with the assigned SW.

reasoning_trace_triples.situation: Ambiguity regarding post-discharge wound care during the 48-hour gap (Sunday-Tuesday).
reasoning_trace_triples.action_taken: Followed up with Home Healthcare Coordinator (Ashley) on Day 1 post-visit.
reasoning_trace_triples.result: Confirmed visit completion and closed the clinical loop.

rank_1_best_practices.action: Prioritized HHA referral and bedside meeting immediately upon receiving 11/9 date.
rank_1_best_practices.rationale: Direct patient engagement reduces anxiety and ensures scheduling alignment.

rank_1_best_practices.action: Verified HHA arrival and status with the Home Healthcare Coordinator.
rank_1_best_practices.rationale: Ensures the 'warm handoff' actually occurred despite the PN technically being 'off' the case.

rank_0_boundary_failures.context: Discharge date selection vs. clinical necessity.
rank_0_boundary_failures.action: Passive acceptance of the 11/9 date provided by the SW without questioning 90-day stay length.

rank_0_boundary_failures.context: Clinical oversight of wound status on 11/10.
rank_0_boundary_failures.action: Assuming the doctor/dialysis team checked the wound without explicit verification.

unscripted_chaos_signals: Institutional scale (3 SWs on different floors)
